Package fr.istic.groupimpl.synthesizer.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Oscilloscope.GetBuffer
    interface of the getBuffuer command.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DebugJFXTools
    Dump tree of javafx node.
    DoubleDuodecimalStringConverter
    Convert String to Double, string is in duodecimal format ( radix 12 ).
    DoubleStringConverter
    Converter double in string.
    Oscilloscope
    Oscilloscope module.
    OscilloscopeFactory
    The class OscilloscopeFactory.
    Potentiometre
    Implementation of knob with configurable graduations To create a Potentiometre object, you must use PotentiometreFactory Example : PotentiometreFactory potentiometreFactory = PotentiometreFactory.getFactoryInstance(); initialisations on the factory object Potentiometre potentiometre = potentiometreFactory.getPotentiometre();
    PotentiometreFactory
    The Class PotentiometreFactory The default values are : private String title = "" private double rayon = Potentiometre.RAYON_REF private double minValue = 0 private double maxValue = 100 private boolean discret = false private double nbSpins = 1 private boolean showTickMarks = false private boolean showTickLabels = false private double majorTickUnit = 5
    SignalUtil
    The Class SignalUtil.
